lines.text: Every actor in New York will love you!
I don't want every actor in New York to love me! I want my wife to love me!
Please wait don't send my brother to the chair, don't let him burn, please please warden please
I don't think I like you.
I was a failure yesterday, now look at me today!
You mean you even looked worse yesterday?
Will ya sing me a song?
How do you know I can?
Because you sing when you talk. When you walk. Why your eyes, why their singing right now
They are? Well I'll be darned
Looks like somebody's been reading our mail.
